summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Mayor to enter into and execute agreements with Burlington Northern, Inc., a railroad company, for the design and installation of railroad crossing signal devices for the Alaskan Way Railroad Signals Project; and with the Washington State Department of Transportation for Federal Highway Safety Act, Title 23, U.S. Code Highways, Section 203 and 230 funds for partial payment; and making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
